name: Bunkyr
headline: Zero-Knowledge security without seed phrases or backup codes
description:
Bunkyr enables companies to protect their users’ data with a simple, hardware-secured API. When a user forgets their password, applications using Bunkyr can provide them a familiar, robust recovery method to restore access to encrypted data.

Zero-Knowledge architectures and end-to-end encryption are the only true safeguards against data breaches, but come with large user-experience burdens and engineering overhead. Bunkyr eliminates these obstacles in a way that is friendly to both developers and users, cost-effective, and extremely fast.

Users won’t even know Bunkyr exists, while their data stays protected against both breaches and lost passwords.

generated_description:
Bunkyr is a fresh, innovative company founded in 2021 and hailing from Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch. Based in Denver, Colorado, their mission is clear: they aim to provide Zero-Knowledge security, eliminating the need for seed phrases or backup codes. This is a big deal in a world where data breaches are rampant and password recovery methods can often feel archaic.

Initially, Bunkyr launched as a service that allows businesses to protect their users' data through a simple, hardware-secured API. The beauty of their solution is that when users forget their passwords, Bunkyr facilitates a seamless recovery process that restores access to encrypted data without compromising security. 

What sets Bunkyr apart is their focus on user experience. Zero-Knowledge architectures and end-to-end encryption are the gold standard for data protection, yet they often come with significant burdens for both developers and users. Bunkyr sidesteps these challenges with a solution that is not just effective but also user-friendly and fast. Impressively, most users won’t even realize Bunkyr is in the background, quietly ensuring their data remains safe from breaches and lost passwords.

Though small in size—comprising a team of just three—Bunkyr is tagging itself as a go-to player in developer tools, SaaS, crypto/web3, and security. Their holistic approach means businesses can now secure sensitive user data without sacrificing performance or convenience.

If you're curious to learn more, visit their website at [bunkyr.com](https://bunkyr.com). They’re definitely worth keeping an eye on in the rapidly evolving landscape of data security.
